Name: 渴血
Description: 消耗自身四点生命,获得{0}层锋锐。
Description_en: Consume 4 health to gain {0} stacks of {buff_stretch}.

Name: 聚气凝神
Description: 丢弃自身所有手牌,每丢弃二张获得1层锋锐。
Name_en: Gather Qi and Focus the Mind
Description_en: Discard all cards in your hand. For every 2 cards discarded, gain 1 stack of {buff_stretch}.

Name: 无我一击
Description: 每有二层锋锐造成{0}点物理伤害一次。结束后锋锐层数减半。
Description_en: Deal {0} physical damage. Repeat for every 2 stacks of {buff_stretch} you have, halving the number of stacks of {buff_stretch} you have.

Name: 治愈祈愿
Description: 往抽牌堆中加入三张圣疗术。
Description_en: Add 3 Holy Healing to your draw deck.

Name: 饮血刺剑
Description: 造成{0}点伤害,恢复{1}点生命。

Name: 黄金之音
Description: 结束本回合,造成{0}点伤害,恢复{1}点生命。
Description_en: End this turn, deal {0} damage, and restore 5 health.

Name: 悔悟
Description: 自身获得锋锐层数两倍的生命。
